name: Pidgey Scoot
description: Pidgey is a city Pidgeon running on the rooftops searchin for some tasty snacks. Help Pidgey collect all types of food- but watch out, you'll have to fly over gaps and avoid trash some no good litterer has left! Pidgey gains points for how long they last on the rooftops and how many yummy foods they can collect, some being more valuable than others, and lose points when accidentally munchin on some trash.
